reviewText: Great Christmas gift for mother in law she loved it came in on time
My elderly mom really loves to listen to and watch the Hoppers
I love to hear the Hoppers sing and I love to watch them.  I wish they had more DVD's.  So far I have all 4 of them. buy his
This dvd is great.  I enjoy the gaither gospel series so I enjoyed the hoppers.

If you are a gospel music buff
like I am, this is a DVD you need.
Everything about it is so good.

Although the group has always pioneered technological advances in their recordings, this one is by far the group's best to date!  If you happen to be watching on a plasma or LCD you will feel as though you are in a live concert with them because the clarity is so magnificent!  If you are a fan you MUST add this DVD to your collection, as the sound is just as great as the video!  Enjoy!
